name: Tesla Model 3
description: The Tesla Model 3 is a compact executive sedan that is battery powered and produced by Tesla. Limited production started in mid-2017, with full production in September 2017.

name: Nissan Leaf
description: The Nissan Leaf is a compact five-door hatchback electric car. It was the world's best-selling highway-capable electric car in history.

name: Chevrolet Bolt EV
description: The Chevrolet Bolt EV is a front-motor, front-wheel-drive all-electric subcompact hatchback marketed by Chevrolet.

name: BMW i3
description: The BMW i3 is a B-class, high-roof hatchback manufactured and marketed by BMW with an electric powertrain using rear wheel drive.

name: Hyundai Kona Electric
description: The Hyundai Kona Electric is a subcompact crossover SUV. It offers impressive range and practicality in a compact package.

name: Tesla Model S
description: The Tesla Model S is a luxury all-electric sedan with incredible performance and the longest range of any EV on the market.

name: Tesla Model X
description: The Tesla Model X is a mid-size luxury crossover SUV with distinctive falcon-wing doors and seating for up to seven adults.

name: Audi e-tron
description: The Audi e-tron is a luxury electric SUV that combines Audi's premium quality with cutting-edge electric technology.

name: Porsche Taycan
description: The Porsche Taycan is a high-performance electric sports sedan that delivers the legendary Porsche driving experience with zero emissions.

name: Ford Mustang Mach-E
description: The Ford Mustang Mach-E is an all-electric SUV inspired by the legendary Mustang, offering style, performance, and practicality.

name: Volkswagen ID.4
description: The Volkswagen ID.4 is a compact electric SUV that offers spacious interior, modern technology, and excellent value for money.

name: Rivian R1T
description: The Rivian R1T is an all-electric adventure pickup truck designed for both on-road comfort and off-road capability.

name: Lucid Air
description: The Lucid Air is a luxury electric sedan with the longest range of any EV, combining stunning design with cutting-edge technology.

name: Polestar 2
description: The Polestar 2 is a premium electric fastback that combines Scandinavian design with Google-powered infotainment.

name: Kia EV6
description: The Kia EV6 is a stylish electric crossover with impressive performance, fast charging capability, and a spacious interior.
